title: Life Science HiSET.S.2.1 (Q16)
prompt: Which of the following is a research question suggested by the scientist’s data?
feedback: The correct answer is “What causes variation in meristematic cell size?” This question is suggested by the measured variation in size of meristematic cells. It’s a potential research question based on the scientist’s data. The questions “Which cell in the data is largest?” and “What is the range of lengths of the meristematic cells studied?” are questions about the data, not question for further research. The question “What species of plants have meristematic cells?” is a possible research question, but it’s not related to the scientist’s data.
